Tempat Liburan Susi di Jepang: Nongkrong di Depan Kapal Pesiar
04 Nov 2019, 23:03 by Bonauli


Salamat datang di Yokohama (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

Jakarta - Kota Yokohama di Jepang menjadi tempat pilihan Susi Pudjiastuti liburan. Tahukah kamu, kalau Yokohama adalah kota pelabuhan yang keren?Diintip detikcom dari akun Twitternya, Senin (4/11/2019) Susi Pudjiastuti terlihat liburan di Kota Yokohama di Jepang. Berlatar kapal pesiar, Susi mantap berfoto di dermaga pelabuhan Yokohama.Apa yang membuat kota ini begitu spesial?Jepang tak cuma Tokyo, Osaka dan Okinawa saja. Ada Kota Yokohama yang juga jadi destinasi keren untuk berwisata. Mari mulai dengan mengenal sedikit tentang Kota Yokohama.

[Gambas:Twitter]



Foto: (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

Kota Yokohama jadi yang terbesar kedua di Jepang. Berdekatan dengan laut, Yokohama menjadi Kota Pelabuhan Jepang yang berkembang pesat.Menurut catatan sejarah, Yokohama dulunya adalah kota nelayan kecil. Yokohama jadi salah satu labuhan pertama yang menyambut perdagangan luar negeri di abad ke-19. Semakin lama Yokohama berkembang menjadi Kota Metropolis yang ramai. Yokohama juga menjadi ibukota prefektur Kanagawa. Letaknya strategis, setengah jam dari Tokyo.Karena statusnya sebagai Kota Pelabuhan, Yokohama menyuguhkan tempat nongkrong yang tak biasa. Bukan cuma pemandangan kota, wisatawan bisa menikmati kapal pesiar di lautan.


Foto: (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

Tempat populernya adalah Osanbashi Pier dan Minato Mirai. Osanbashi Pier adalah terminal kapal pesiar. Dermaga ini berbentuk unik seperti ikan paus. Bagian dek pemberangkatannya disebut dengan Kujira-no-senaka (punggung paus), dan lobi imigrasinya dinamakan Kujira-no-onaka (perut paus).Banyak pengunjung yang menikmati indahnya pemandangan di sini dengan jogging, piknik, membaca buku ataupun berfoto-foto. Jangan heran banyak fotografer yang menyukai daerah ini. Terutama saat menjelang sore. Karena sunset disini indahnya tak terlukiskan.Sedangkan Minato Mirai adalah tanah reklamasi yang dibuat menjadi kawasan kota modern. Seperti unggahan Susi, blue sky blue ocean jadi suguhan utama.Puas melihat lautan, traveler bisa bermain ke Yokohama Landmark Tower. Yokohama Landmark Tower, salah satu gedung pencakar langit di Jepang punya panorama yang cantik dari ketinggian 296 meter.


Foto: (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

Bangunan ikonik ini punya Sky Garden yang jadi dek observasi. Berada di lantai 69 di ketinggian 273 meter, kamu akan melihat Taman rekreasi Cosmo World dengan Vanish Roller Coaster kebanggaan Yokohama.Vanish Roller Coaster, yang punya panjang lintasan sekitar 774 meter. Keunikan roller coaster tersebut adalah memasuki kolam. Setelah berputar-putar di ketinggian, roller Coaster ini akan menukik tajam ke dalam kolam!Tenang saja, roller coasternya tidak menghantam air kolam. Kolamnya memiliki lubang untuk dilalui roller coaster. Namun di sekitar lubangnya, semprotan air yang banyak akan membuat seolah-olah turis menghantam air.


Foto: (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

Sebagai negeri yang maju dalam bidang teknologi, rasanya kurang lengkap kalau kamu tak mencoba lift di Yokohama Landmark Tower. Bangunan ini punya salah satu lift tercepat dunia. Satu menitnya mencapai 750 meter!Untuk datang ke Yokohama Landmark Tower, siapkan kocek 1000 Yen atau setara Rp 130 ribu saja. Jadwal bukanya dari pukul 10.00 sampai 21.00 waktu setempat. Khusus wekend dan hari libur lainnya, tutupnya lebih malam pada pukul 22.00 waktu setempat.Jalan-jalan kurang lengkap tanpa wisata kuliner. Yang harus di coba di Yokohama adalah ramen susu di Shin-Yokohama Raumen Museum. Selain melihat sejarah perjalanan ramen, kamu juga bisa menikmati rasa ramen asli Negeri Sakura yang dicampur susu.Pindah ke Cup Noodles Museum, traveler bisa melihat museum keren dengan tema mie instan. Lantai satu museum berisi loket tiket dan toko suvenir mie. Kemudian di lantai dua, traveler akan melihat sejarah mie instan di Jepang dari tahun 1958 sampai sekarang.Cup Noodles Museum dibangun untuk mengenang Momofuku Ando. Dialah yang disebut-sebut penemu mie instan di Jepan dan cup noodles (mie dalam kemasan gelas). Dia juga yang mendirikan Nissin Food.Di lantai 3, merupakan tempat yang paling ditungu-tunggu oleh traveler. Di sinilah, terdapat Chicken Ramen Factory dan My CUPNOODLES Factory. Siapa saja bisa mencoba langsung membuat cup noodles sendiri. Jadi, kamu akan diberi bungkusan mienya dan bisa digambar sesuai imajinasi.Yokohama juga masih punya Chinatown. Chinatown ini jadi salah satu yang terbesar di dunia lho!


Foto: (Afif Farhan/detikcom)

Ada juga gedung bersejarah Red Brick Warehouse. Red Brick warehouse merupakan bangunan lama yang saat ini difungsikan menjadi shopping area berupa toko-toko kecil, cafe, restaurant dan live music. Dahulunya bangunan ini pernah menjadi gudang umum dan tempat untuk menyimpan peralatan militer saat perang.Rasanya, Bu Susi bisa menikmati banyak destinasi keren ya di Yokohama. Susi Vacation Rentals in Japan: Hang out in Front of a Cruise Ship
Nov 04 2019, 23:03 by Bonauli


Salamat came to Yokohama (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

Jakarta - The city of Yokohama in Japan is the place of choice for Susi Pudjiastuti. Did you know that Yokohama is a cool port city? Peeked detikcom from his Twitter account, Monday (11/04/2019) Susi Pudjiastuti was seen on vacation in Yokohama City in Japan. Set in a cruise ship, Susi is admirably photographed at the port of Yokohama. What makes this city so special? Japan is not only Tokyo, Osaka and Okinawa. There is Yokohama City which is also a cool destination for traveling. Let's start by getting to know a little about Yokohama City.

[Gambas: Twitter]



Photo: (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

The city of Yokohama is the second largest in Japan. Adjacent to the sea, Yokohama is a rapidly developing Japanese Harbor City. According to historical records, Yokohama was once a small fishing town. Yokohama became one of the first ports to welcome foreign trade in the 19th century. Over time Yokohama developed into a bustling Metropolis City. Yokohama is also the capital of Kanagawa prefecture. Strategic location, half an hour from Tokyo. Because of its status as a Harbor City, Yokohama presents an unusual hangout. Not just a view of the city, tourists can enjoy cruises in the ocean.


Photo: (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

Popular places are Osanbashi Pier and Minato Mirai. Osanbashi Pier is a cruise ship terminal. This wharf is uniquely shaped like a whale. The departure deck is called Kujira-no-senaka (whale's back), and the immigration lobby is called Kujira-no-onaka (whale's stomach). Many visitors enjoy the beautiful scenery here by jogging, picnicking, reading books or taking photographs. Don't be surprised that many photographers love this area. Especially in the late afternoon. Because the sunset here is beautifully indescribable. While Minato Mirai is a reclaimed land made into a modern city area. Like Susi's upload, blue sky blue ocean is the main treat. Satisfied with seeing the ocean, a traveler can play to the Yokohama Landmark Tower. Yokohama Landmark Tower, one of the skyscrapers in Japan has a beautiful panorama from a height of 296 meters.


Photo: (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

This iconic building has Sky Garden which is an observation deck. Located on the 69th floor at an altitude of 273 meters, you will see the Cosmo World theme park with Vanish Roller Coaster pride of Yokohama. The Spanish Roller Coaster, which has a track length of about 774 meters. The uniqueness of the roller coaster is entering the pool. After circling at a height, this roller coaster will dive sharply into the pond! Take it easy, the roller coaster does not hit the pool water. The pool has a hole for roller coasters to pass through. But around the hole, a lot of water spray will make it look as if tourists hit the water.


Photo: (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

As a developed country in the field of technology, it seems incomplete if you don't try the elevator at the Yokohama Landmark Tower. This building has one of the world's fastest elevators. One minute reaches 750 meters! To come to Yokohama Landmark Tower, prepare a 1000 Yen pocket or equivalent to Rp 130 thousand. The schedule is open from 10:00 to 21:00 local time. Specifically for wekend and other holidays, it closes later at 22.00 local time. The streets are incomplete without culinary tourism. What you should try in Yokohama is milk ramen at the Shin-Yokohama Raumen Museum. In addition to seeing the history of ramen travel, you can also enjoy the original ramen taste of Sakura mixed with milk. Moving to the Cup Noodles Museum, a traveler can see a cool museum with the theme of instant noodles. The first floor of the museum contains a ticket window and noodle gift shop. Then on the second floor, a traveler will see the history of instant noodles in Japan from 1958 until now. The Cup Noodles Museum was built to commemorate Momofuku Ando. He is said to have invented instant noodles in Japan and cup noodles (noodles in glass containers). He also founded Nissin Food. On the 3rd floor, is the place the traveler has been waiting for the most. Here, there are Chicken Ramen Factory and My CUPNOODLES Factory. Anyone can try directly making their own cup noodles. So, you will be given a packet of noodles and can be drawn according to the imagination. Yokohama also still has Chinatown. This Chinatown is one of the biggest in the world!


Photo: (Afif Farhan / detikcom)

There is also a historic Red Brick Warehouse building. Red Brick warehouse is an old building that currently functions as a shopping area in the form of small shops, cafes, restaurants and live music. Formerly this building was once a public warehouse and a place to store military equipment during the war. I think, Mrs. Susi can enjoy many cool destinations in Yokohama.
